title: Action Hero Rain
description: Action Hero Rain code name is: G.I.Rain In this new action novel for kids, is a wonderful action story book.Rain had to become a real action hero, to save a community that was in trouble.Action Hero Rain uses his code name G.I.Rain to survive and defeat his dangerous mission.Action Hero Rain is a ninja who real name is Rain Fields.www.facebook.com/g.i.rainfields
author: Rain Fields
